code: import{useCallback}from'react';import useBombFinance from'./useBombFinance';import useHandleTransactionReceipt from'./useHandleTransactionReceipt';var useWithdrawFromBoardroom=function useWithdrawFromBoardroom(){var bombFinance=useBombFinance();var handleTransactionReceipt=useHandleTransactionReceipt();var handleWithdraw=useCallback(function(amount){handleTransactionReceipt(bombFinance.withdrawShareFromBoardroom(amount),"Withdraw ".concat(amount," BSHARE from the boardroom"));},[bombFinance,handleTransactionReceipt]);return{onWithdraw:handleWithdraw};};export default useWithdrawFromBoardroom;
